page.title: 17MY SCHOOL DAY,BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: I get to school at{8.40am.}The whistle is blown at{8.50am.}we line up and go in to our classrooms.We sit down and wait until our teacher takes the register.On a Tuesday we go down to the hall for hymn practice. This lasts for half an hour then we come back to our classroom and do some maths for half an hour then we do some writing in our language books. At{10.45}we go out to play.I play french skipping.At {11}we get changed for P.E.which is non stop cricket.At{12}it's dinner time. After dinner we go out to play again until{1.20}then we come back to our classrooms and do some project work on space exploration until{2.30.}From then till{2.45}it's afternoon play.We then go to the hall to rehearse our leavers' play "The Happy Prince". Finally at{3.35}we put up our chairs and go home.{Tues 2nd July 1985.
